meanings.definition: The quality or state of being sandy.
meanings.sent1: The sandiness of the beach made it perfect for building sandcastles.
meanings.sent2: I could feel the sandiness of the soil as I dug my hands into the ground.
meanings.sent3: The sandiness of the cookies added a unique crunch to each bite.
meanings.sent4: Her hair had a natural sandiness to it, shimmering in the sunlight like golden grains.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the essence of sandiness in the painting, creating a textured masterpiece.

meanings.definition: The presence of sand or sandy particles.
meanings.sent1: The sandiness on the floor indicated that someone had been to the beach.
meanings.sent2: I could see the sandiness on his shoes after he returned from the sandy beach.
meanings.sent3: The sandiness in the air reminded me of our fun day at the beach.
meanings.sent4: The sandiness in the car was a clear sign of our beach adventure.
meanings.sent5: The sandiness on her clothes told the story of a day spent by the shore.
